markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Divine Effusion](/Feats.aspx?ID=6085) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Oracle" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=817" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 143 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

The power of your mystery surges through you like a font of [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=579) energy, even when your own magic dwindles. Twice per day, you can cast a spell after you've run out of spell slots of the appropriate spell rank; the two spells you cast with this feat must be of different spell ranks.
name: Divine Effusion
